ArrayReal1

This component acts as an array for 32-bit floating point data. When the input event [In]write fires, the input data [In]data is added to the array at the index specified by [In]index and the output event [Out]write is triggered. When the input event [In]read fires, the data in the array at the index specified by [In]index is presented to the output [Out]data and the output event [Out]read is triggered.

Please note that the array is zero indexed and the maxmum index is therefore the value of the parameter specifying the maximum size of the array - 1. If an index of less than 0 or greater than or equal to the maximum array size is used when writing to or reading from the array then the corresponding output event [Out]err will be triggered. Also note that data is persistent at the output [Out]data.

The default value parameter specifies the default value for uninitialised values in the array.

Ports

  • [In] data:

    Data input.

  • [Out] data:

    Data output.

  • [In] write:

    Input event, writes the input [In]data to the array at index [In]index.

  • [In] index:

    Data input, specified the index in the array to write the input [In]data to.

  • [Out] write:

    Output event, triggered if the array has been successfully written to.

  • [Out] err:

    Output event, triggered if there has been an error when writing to the array.

  • [In] read:

    Input event, reads data from the array at index [In]index and presents it to the output [Out]data.

  • [In] index:

    Data input, specified the index in the array to read the data in the array.

  • [Out] read:

    Output event, triggered if the array has been successfully read.

  • [Out] err:

    Output event, triggered if there has been an error when reading the array.

  • [In] clear:

    Input event, clears the array and triggers the output event [Out]clear.

  • [Out] clear:

    Output event.

Parameters

  • size:

    Maximum number of items allocated memory for in the array

    Data Type:

    I,

    Min Value:

    2,

    Max Value:

    1024,

    Default Value:

    1024

  • default value:

    default value for uninitialised values

    Data Type:

    F,

    Min Value:

    None,

    Max Value:

    None,

    Default Value:

    NaN

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
